about_the_game:
Bar Girls: Daddy's Girls

This is a girl game

Welcome to the world of Bar Girls, an underground bar full of charm and secrets. Here, meet our charming heroines, and their unique portraits will add infinite charm to your game journey.

In the game, you can grab eggs first to get points.

When you have enough eggs, you can challenge the girls.

Exquisite portrait display

1 Sato Megumi: Possessing the mysterious beauty of the East, her eyes hide countless stories, waiting for the closest listener.

2 Elena: A blonde beauty with blue eyes, every look is full of temptation, the light of the bar.

3 Brooke: Her portrait is full of confidence and strength, mysterious pink hair, passionate, irresistible.



Egg Points System

In Bar Girls, the simple activity of egg-breaking becomes an art and strategy. Players accumulate points by breaking eggs, and these points are used to interact with the girls. Win favorability.

Fighting to Win Favorability

Dive into the world of Bar Girls and increase your favorability with Bar Girls through the traditional game of finger-guessing. Choose your Bar Girl and play finger-guessing with her one-on-one. Every time you win a round, you not only win the game, but also win her heart. As your favorability increases, unlock more interactions to make your game experience more colorful.

Get enough eggs and challenge the interactive experience of finger-guessing with the girls. Win favorability.

name: BarGirls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: winows7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2g
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8g
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Get enough eggs and challenge the interactive experience of finger-guessing with the girls. Win favorability.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
